items.sentence: I haven\'t yet used the new hammer that you gave me.
Tom is sitting in the garden, reading the newspaper.
Can\'t you see I\'m in the middle of something here?
I\'d like to know why you didn\'t just wait for Tom.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom won\'t cancel the meeting.
I didn\'t know how to tell Tom I didn\'t want to go.
I didn\'t know what I\'d done was against the rules.
It might be kind of fun going to the beach with Tom.
It never occurred to me that Tom might not eat meat.
It\'ll be difficult to glue the two pieces together.
It\'ll take a little time to get used to doing this.
It\'s a fifteen minute walk from here to the campus.
I wonder whether or not Tom has a driver\'s license.
What makes you think Tom won\'t know how to do that?
Tom handed me a broom and told me to start sweeping.
There\'s a possibility the meeting will be canceled.
Who\'s the author of the novel that you\'re reading?
I\'m going to try to stop Tom from doing that again.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice are all innocent children.
Did Tom ever tell you where the treasure was buried?
